description: Simple, direct instruction with no additional context
prompt_template: Classify the sentiment of this text as 'positive' or 'negative': {text}

results.text: This movie was absolutely fantastic! I loved every minute of it.
Worst product I've ever purchased. Complete waste of money.
results.response: The sentiment of this text is NEGATIVE. The use of the words "worst," "complete waste," and "money" convey a negative emotion towards the product.

results.text: The service at this restaurant was outstanding and the food was delicious.
I'm extremely disappointed with the quality. It broke after one day.
results.response: The sentiment of this text is NEGATIVE. The use of the word "disappointed" and the fact that the product broke after only one day indicate a negative sentiment towards the product.

results.text: What a wonderful experience! Highly recommend to everyone.
Terrible customer support. They never responded to my emails.
This book changed my life. Such an inspiring read!
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of words like "changed" and "inspiring" convey a sense of excitement and enthusiasm, indicating a positive sentiment.

results.text: The app keeps crashing. Very frustrating and unreliable.
Amazing quality and fast shipping. Will definitely buy again!
Not worth the price at all. Very disappointed with my purchase.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is NEGATIVE. The use of the phrase "Not worth the price at all" and "very disappointed" convey a negative emotional tone.

results.text: The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful throughout my visit.
Poor quality materials and terrible design. Would not recommend.
Best purchase I've made this year! Exceeded all my expectations.
The hotel was dirty and the staff was rude. Never going back.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is NEGATIVE. The use of words like "dirty" and "rude" convey a negative experience, and the statement "Never going back" further emphasizes the negative sentiment.

results.text: I'm so happy with this decision. Everything worked out perfectly!
This is a scam. Don't waste your time or money on this.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is NEGATIVE. The use of the phrase "scam" and the advice to "don't waste your time or money on this" convey a negative opinion of the subject being discussed.

results.text: Brilliant performance! The actors were phenomenal.
Horrible experience from start to finish. Total disaster.
The interface is intuitive and the features are exactly what I needed.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of the word "intuitive" and "exactly" suggests that the user found the interface to be easy to use and tailored to their needs, which is a positive experience.

results.text: Buggy software with no support. Save yourself the headache.
results.response: The sentiment of this text is NEGATIVE. The use of the phrase "headache" to describe the experience of using buggy software and lack of support suggests frustration, annoyance, or dissatisfaction.

results.text: Exceptional value for money. I'm thoroughly impressed!
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of the word "impressed" and the phrase "exceptional value for money" both convey a positive tone.

results.text: The wait time was ridiculous and the service was subpar.
results.response: The sentiment of this text is NEGATIVE. The use of words like "ridiculous" and "subpar" convey a negative tone and indicate that the speaker had a poor experience with the service.

results.text: Beautiful design and works flawlessly. Couldn't be happier!
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of words such as "beautiful," "flawlessly," and "happier" convey a positive tone and indicate satisfaction or happiness with the product.

results.text: Misleading advertising. The actual product is nothing like described.
Five stars all the way! This exceeded every expectation.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of the phrase "Five stars all the way!" and the statement that the experience exceeded every expectation both convey a positive tone.

results.text: Unreliable and inconsistent. Very frustrating to use.
The team was professional and delivered outstanding results.
Overpriced and underwhelming. Expected much better quality.
Love it! This has made my daily routine so much easier.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is POSITIVE. The use of the word "love" and the statement that the product has made their daily routine easier both contribute to a positive overall tone.

results.text: Regret buying this. It doesn't work as advertised.
results.response: The sentiment of the text is NEGATIVE. The use of the word "regret" and the statement that the product "doesn't work as advertised" convey a negative emotion towards the product.
